Goth shows traces of the presumably homogeneous language of EEF, with Basque as only known survivor:  
to bite  | kosk egin | ğŒºğŒ°ğŒ¿ğƒ. ğŒ¾ğŒ°ğŒ½ ( egin : goin/doin )
